Title: Jew Suss: Rise and Fall
Writer: Klaus Richter (screenplay), Oskar Roehler (collaborating writer), Franz Novotny (collaborating writer), Friedrich Knilli (book), Michael Esser (script development)
Actors: Tobias Moretti, Martina Gedeck, Moritz Bleibtreu, Justus von Dohnányi
Plot: Rise and fall of actor Ferdinand Marian, who takes the chance and stars in the anti-semitic movie Jud Süß (1940).
